help.simple: Returns a full list of commands the bot will accept, or details information about a specified command.

ping.simple: A simple ping to the bot to see if it will respond.

botinfo.simple: Returns basic information about the bot.

serverinfo.simple: Returns basic information about the current server.

changeprefix.simple: Allows a user to change the prefix for Atlas on the current server.

clear.simple: Allows a user to clear a specified number of messages from current channel.

djleave.simple: Join from the currently connected voice channel.

djplay.simple: Play a song from a provided URL
